content:
I’m a Senior Software Engineer at 3M Health Information Systems. My research interests include computational statistics, causal inference, reinforcement learning, and simulated environments, and the application of these areas to education and healthcare.
At 3M, I’m engaged in research and development of inpatient and outpatient measures for the 3M Performance Matrix Platform, a tool for healthcare payers and providers to model cost, utilization, and quality outcomes and analyze performance in managing patients across visits, episodes of care, and disease classifications.
